languages.text: {n}Ксенос встряхивает головой.{/n} "Вся эта болтовня мне порядком осточертела... впрочем..." {n}Он бросает на Назракея восторженный взгляд и хватается за оружие.{/n} "Если я сам вырежу сердце этой дряхлой развалины — оно того стоило!"

{n}He shakes his head.{/n} "I have grown tired of all this chatter... but..." {n}He casts a rapturous glance at Nazrakhei and grabs his weapon.{/n} "If I cut out the heart of that decrepit wreck myself, it will have been worth it!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос встряхивает головой.{/n} "Вся эта болтовня мне порядком осточертела... впрочем..." {n}Он бросает на Назракея восторженный взгляд и хватается за оружие.{/n} "Если я сам вырежу сердце этой дряхлой развалины — оно того стоило!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos shakes his head.{/n} "I have grown tired of all this chatter... but..." {n}He casts a rapturous glance at Nazrakhei and grabs his weapon.{/n} "If I cut out the heart of that decrepit wreck myself, it was worth it!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin all das Gerede leid ... aber ..." {n}Er wirft Nazrakhei einen entzückten Blick zu und greift sich seine Waffe.{/n} "Wenn ich diesem altersschwachen Wrack selbst das Herz herausschneide, hat es sich gelohnt!"
languages.original_text: {n}He shakes his head.{/n} "I have grown tired of all this chatter... but..." {n}He casts a rapturous glance at Nazrakhei and grabs his weapon.{/n} "If I cut out the heart of that decrepit wreck myself, it will have been worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin all das Gerede leid ... aber ..." {n}Er wirft Nazrakhei einen entzückten Blick zu und greift sich seine Waffe.{/n} "Wenn ich diesem altersschwachen Wrack selbst das Herz herausschneide, hat es sich gelohnt!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}他摇摇了头。{/n}“尽管我已经厌倦了这喋喋不休的唠叨……不过……”{n}他以狂喜的目光看了纳札骸一眼，握紧了武器。{/n}“如果我能亲手把这老东西的心脏挖出来，那这些废话都是值得的！”
languages.original_text: {n}He shakes his head.{/n} "I have grown tired of all this chatter... but..." {n}He casts a rapturous glance at Nazrakhei and grabs his weapon.{/n} "If I cut out the heart of that decrepit wreck myself, it will have been worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他摇摇了头。{/n}“尽管我已经厌倦了这喋喋不休的唠叨……不过……”{n}他以狂喜的目光看了纳札骸一眼，握紧了武器。{/n}“如果我能亲手把这老东西的心脏挖出来，那这些废话都是值得的！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai secoue la tête.{/n} « Je suis las de ces bavardages... mais... » {n}Il jette un regard ravi à Nazrakhei et saisit son arme.{/n} « Si j'excise moi-même le cœur de cette épave décrépie, je ne serai pas venu pour rien ! »
languages.original_text: {n}He shakes his head.{/n} "I have grown tired of all this chatter... but..." {n}He casts a rapturous glance at Nazrakhei and grabs his weapon.{/n} "If I cut out the heart of that decrepit wreck myself, it will have been worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai secoue la tête.{/n} « Je suis las de ces bavardages... mais... » {n}Il jette un regard ravi à Nazrakhei et saisit son arme.{/n} « Si j'excise moi-même le cœur de cette épave décrépie, je ne serai pas venu pour rien ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Me he hartado de tanta charla... pero...». {n}Lanza una mirada rapaz a Nazrakhei y empuña su arma.{/n} «¡Si logro arrancarle el corazón a ese carcamal decrépito, habrá valido la pena!».
languages.original_text: {n}He shakes his head.{/n} "I have grown tired of all this chatter... but..." {n}He casts a rapturous glance at Nazrakhei and grabs his weapon.{/n} "If I cut out the heart of that decrepit wreck myself, it will have been worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Me he hartado de tanta charla... pero...». {n}Lanza una mirada rapaz a Nazrakhei y empuña su arma.{/n} «¡Si logro arrancarle el corazón a ese carcamal decrépito, habrá valido la pena!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼は頭を振る。{/n}「全くうんざりする…だが…」{n}彼はナズラクヘイに熱烈な視線を送り、武器を掴む。{/n}「もし俺が自分であのオンボロ船の心臓部を止められたなら、価値のあることになるだろう！」
languages.original_text: {n}He shakes his head.{/n} "I have grown tired of all this chatter... but..." {n}He casts a rapturous glance at Nazrakhei and grabs his weapon.{/n} "If I cut out the heart of that decrepit wreck myself, it will have been worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は頭を振る。{/n}「全くうんざりする…だが…」{n}彼はナズラクヘイに熱烈な視線を送り、武器を掴む。{/n}「もし俺が自分であのオンボロ船の心臓部を止められたなら、価値のあることになるだろう！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bütün bu konuşmalardan sıkıldım ama..." {n}Avına saldırmak üzere olan vahşi bir hayvan misali Nazrakhei'e bakıp silahını kavrıyor.{/n} "Bu virane kadının kalbini sökebilirsem bunca şeye katlandığıma değer!"
languages.original_text: {n}He shakes his head.{/n} "I have grown tired of all this chatter... but..." {n}He casts a rapturous glance at Nazrakhei and grabs his weapon.{/n} "If I cut out the heart of that decrepit wreck myself, it will have been worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bütün bu konuşmalardan sıkıldım ama..." {n}Nazrakhei'e avına saldırmak üzere olan vahşi bir hayvan gibi bakıyor ve silahını kavrıyor.{/n} "Bu çökmüş döküntünün kalbini sökebileceksem, hepsine değmiş olacak!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
